entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
